Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
As always, looking forward to the coming showing. I watched a bit of Blue Gender once, and it was one of those shows I really wanted to like, but couldn’t bring myself to. That was a long time ago, though, so this time my thoughts might be different. I don’t think I’ve even heard of the other two shows, so that’s exciting.

And this post just makes me more curious about ‘My little sister can’t be this cute!’. I still haven’t seen any, but it still looks like an interesting show. Have to grab some sometime!

Replies.Content:

PSG went back to GODTIER this week. I can haz storie nao? Also kiddies, mark your calendars for December 29th; OST date announced =DDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD!!!!!!!!!

I still have Oreimo 6, Yakumo 6, Bakuman 6, Yosuga no Sora 5, and whatever else I’m watching that I can’t think of to watch, so hopefully this week finishes strong.
